duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the efficient operation of the Printing Department and the organization of its holding areas.
Learn to operate the Guillotine, Sheeter, Aerator, and perform the duties of the Press Operator C to function as a back-up team member when required.
Move and organize stock in the holding areas, pull rolls for Sheeter, and operate Guillotine when required.
Fill out all appropriate documentation, clean up holding areas, Sheeter vicinity, and guillotine area, and perform Quality Control measures.
Operate Aerator and ensure compliance with all regulations, policies, work procedures, safety rules, and security procedures.
Help keep the department in compliance with 5S and SQF guidelines and immediately report any concerns to management.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent G.E.D. with 1-2 years work-related experience in a manufacturing environment and/or training.
